attributes.title: Will take a week to download
attributes.review: I understand some apps take a bit to download but I spend a WEEK having to download this app. Would not recommend if someone is in a rush to get this app give it zero starts if I could.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The crashes every time I try to open it. I chat receive the latest news on the presidents camps if the app won’t even open!!!! Thought this would be a good download but clearly I was wrong!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: So I got it and made my account and suddenly they were selling me to the black market and I was getting yelled at for 420 minutes in a trump voice I had to exit the app also let’s not mention it took 69 hours just to download .

attributes.title: The worst app!!!!
attributes.review: It took forever just to download, and it’s literally one of the worst apps that you can download, it made my phone really slow and now my phone is just turning off by itself after i downloaded that app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!!!!

attributes.title: The case of the shrunken hands
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, my hands shrunk completely to the point that I struggled holding my phone. I had to put the phone on a table and write this review with my two 1 inch index fingers. Thoroughly disappointed in this app mr Trump.

attributes.title: Terrible!!! 🤮🤢🤮🤢
attributes.review: I tried to download the app and it wouldn’t download. It starting spinning and then it just said error downloading. I kept trying but a few days later is still wouldn’t. Worst app especially for Trump!

attributes.title: This app almost KILLED ME!!
attributes.review: A couple of days ago, I want to support my president 💪🏾🇺🇸 so I download this app. However, when I opened it, I literally couldn’t breath 🥴😷🤕 There was a sheer stench of ignorance, bigotry, every type of phobic, and stupidity coming from this app.... and yes, through my PHONE 😱

attributes.title: I LOVE TRUMP BUT HATE THIS APP
attributes.review: Okay i love Trump sooo much💋🎀😽yellow is my favorite color and so i love when he smiles🙈but when I downloaded this app my phone got HACKED🥺😫😱and it wasn’t his smile i saw😬😬it was a scary man🥴🤮he asked for my number and i couldn’t get it to go away. PLEASE NO ONE GET THIS YOU MIGHT HAVE SOMONE HACK YOU LIKE ME!!! please take this app away it’s not safe.

attributes.title: Didn’t think it was as bad as it was
attributes.review: This app took so long to download. At first I hadn’t believed it because of the reviews then I myself started to download it & they weren’t wrong. I would really give it less then 1 star if I could.

attributes.title: Ok hear me out. So there’s this scientist, right?
attributes.review: 🕺 Nugget 🍗 biscuit nugget 🍗 and a biscu- 😛 Hey 👋, what's ⬇ up 🆙? 🤔🤔🤔 Can I 👁 get 😷 uhhhhh 😠... 😈 Number 🔢 15 💀, Burger 🍔 King 👑 foot 👟 lettuce ☘... 😈😈😈 ...you 👈 guys 👦 don't sell 💲💰💵 that? 😰😰 ... bruh ⚠ 😑 Well 🤷‍♀️, I 👥 guess 🤷 I'll 🤮🦠 take 👊 the finest 👌 chicken 🐓 nuggies 🍗 you 😂 guys 👦 sell 💸 hehe 😄🤪🤪🤪! 😋😋😋 Cash 🏦 or Card 💳? Do you 😂 accept 🙀👈 reddit 🤖 karma 🕉?
